articles.title: Greetings to President of Benin
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Benin
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greeting to Thomas Boni Yayi, president of Benin, on the 52nd anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in his message wished Benin steady development and prosperity, expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Visits Flood-hit Areas
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Visits Flood-hit Areas
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim went to Songchon County to acquaint himself with the state of rehabilitation from flood damage.
					 Going round the town area of Songchon, town co-op farm and Ryonghung Co-op Farm, he learnt in detail about the state of damage in various fields, acres of farmland being washed away or buried and the rehabilitation from flood damage. He also consoled the inhabitants in the flood-stricken areas. 
					
					 He held a consultative meeting of the officials concerned on the spot.
					
					 Discussed there were measures for ensuring emergency transport of materials urgent for rehabilitation by concentrating efforts on reconstruction of railways and roads while paying primary attention to stabilizing the people's living in the flood-hit areas.
					
					 The premier underscored the need to energetically push ahead with the work for recovering from the flood damage and helping the flood-stricken inhabitants in the spirit of devotedly working for the society and collective.
					
					 After taking stock of the flood damage in Sinyang County, he stressed the need to conduct afforestation for erosion control in a substantial way to suit the characteristic features of the region with lots of high mountains and valleys, and took necessary measures for them.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from C.C., Brazilian Communist Party
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from C.C., Brazilian Communist Party
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party.
					 The gift was handed over to an official concerned by Ricardo Alemao Abreu, international relations secretary of the C.C., the Brazilian Communist Party, on a visit to the DPRK Tuesday.

articles.title: FM Spokesman Slashes at U.S. Authorities' Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Slashes at U.S. Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK issued the following statement on Tuesday:
					 The U.S. authorities are vying each other to commit politically-motivated provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. chief executive asserted that the DPRK's nuclear deterrent for self-defense "threatens the world" while its military chief made oft-repeated trumpeting about "provocations." Officials of the Department of State including its secretary groundlessly slandered the DPRK on the basis of a variety of wild rumors about its situation without their own judgments to distinguish truth from lies. They are still pulling up the DPRK over its launch of satellite for peaceful purposes in a clumsy bid to justify their hostile policy toward it.
					
					 The outbursts let loose by the authorities, prompted by their inveterate rejection and hostile intents on the ideology and social system chosen by the people of the DPRK clearly proved that the U.S. remains unchanged in its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 It is known to everybody that the U.S. is hostile to the DPRK. But the point is why the authorities of its administration are all out to kick up an unprecedented anti-DPRK smear campaign this time.
					
					 This reflects their fear of the fact that world people are rapidly growing stronger in their admiration and expectation for the rosy future of the DPRK led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un admired by the whole world. Also lurking behind this is their black-hearted intention to calm down bitter denunciation and pressure of the international community to the effect that it is impossible to ensure durable peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula unless the U.S. drops its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. claims that it has no hostile intent on the DPRK while malignantly slandering it. This is no more than sheer hypocrisy aimed to deceive the public, to all intents and purposes, because it is an incoherent one. This is proved by what the U.S. is now doing quite contrary to its claim.
					
					 It is busy staging large-scale joint military exercises against the DPRK one after another after massively introducing ultra-modern war means into south Korea and its vicinity.
					
					 While talking about "people's living" in the DPRK, the U.S. is persisting in its harshest and protracted sanctions and blockade against it, threatening its vital rights and barring it from developing the economy and  improving people's living standard.
					
					 The U.S. is talking to the DPRK that its people would live well if it dismantles its nukes. This reminds one of a wolf preaching that it would not hurt sheep if the sheep has its horns curved.
					
					 It is the DPRK's steadfast option to counter the U.S. hostile policy with bolstered nuclear deterrent.
					
					 Now that the DPRK has powerful nuclear deterrent and strong munitions industry capable of steadily bolstering it, it is capable of putting spurs to the building of an economic power, undeterred by the U.S. persistent hostile policy.
					
					 The DPRK does not need any advice from others as it has strategy and orientation of its own style to develop the economy and improve the standard of people's living and ways to carry them out.
					
					 It will surely build a thriving socialist nation while countering the U.S. hostile policy with its toughest policy, with everybody holding arms in one hand and a banner of industrial revolution in the new century in the other.

articles.title: DPRK Will Take Corresponding Measures against  Terrorism: CPRK
articles.content:
DPRK Will Take Corresponding Measures against Terrorism: CPRK
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued the following statement on Tuesday:
					 As reported, there were press conferences with Pak Jong Suk and Jon Yong Chol shortly ago. Pak came back to the DPRK after being lured and abducted to south Korea by the south Korean puppet regime and Jon, a defector to the south, was arrested after infiltrating into the DPRK to destroy statues symbolic of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its monuments under the manipulation of the U.S. and the south Korean regime. The press conferences fully revealed the truth about the U.S. and the south Korean regime's allurement and abduction of residents of the DPRK and their attempted terrorism.
					
					 Now the service personnel and people of the DPRK and all other Koreans are expressing irrepressible resentment at those attempted terrorist acts and they have aroused concern and shock among the world people.
					
					 Their attempted terrorism is a blatant challenge to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, a wanton violation of its sovereignty and a grave breach of international law.
					
					 This indicates that the hostile forces' moves for subversion and sabotage against the DPRK have entered a very dangerous phase of action. The above-said cases go to clearly prove once again that "defectors to the south" and "human rights in the north" much touted by the U.S. and the south Korean group of traitors are nothing but hypocrisy and their real aim is to do harm to the single-minded unity of the DPRK and bring down its social system.
					
					 Much upset by the disclosure of their crimes in the eyes of the world, the U.S. and the south Korean regime are letting loose a spate of sheer sophism that they "have no hostile intents", it is "an individual deed" and it is "a unilateral smear campaign of the north" in a bid to mislead public opinion, Worse still, they are making desperate efforts to conceal the recent cases by such base methods as killing and eliminating those involved in them.
					
					 With nothing, however, can they conceal or hush up their unethical and hideous crimes.
					
					 Moreover, it is becoming clearer with each passing day that the recent attempted terrorism was an organized and premeditated crime of the U.S. and the puppet regime.
					
					 Wicked traitor Kim Yong Hwan was recently arrested by the Chinese security authorities before being expelled to south Korea. His crime once again confirmed how desperately the regime is working to destroy and sabotage the DPRK. 
					
					 All facts clearly prove that the U.S. and the puppet regime are the worst human rights abusers and chieftains of abduction and terrorism.
					
					 Now that the U.S. and the puppet regime are luring and kidnapping residents of the DPRK in wanton violation of international law and attempting nefarious terrorism against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, it has a legitimate right to take all corresponding steps, pursuant to the DPRK Law and the International Convention on Human Rights and Anti-Terrorism.
					
					 The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea is authorized to solemnly state as follows in this regard:
					
					1. The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime should stop at once the act of luring and abducting DPRK citizens, make an official apology for the hideous politically-motivated, state-sponsored terrorism against the dignity of its supreme leadership and sternly punish the prime movers.
					
					 They should immediately disband anti-DPRK plot-breeding and terrorist organizations including the "Front for Liberation of North Korean People" and the "Society for Destroying Statues", despicable groups of traitors, and discontinue such base and reckless acts as bribing human scum and hurling them into crimes.
					
					2. In case the DPRK's just demands are not met, there will follow corresponding measures including punishment of criminals involved in monstrous terrorism and other subversive and sabotage acts against the DPRK and the operations to lure and abduct its citizens.
					
					 We declare that among the targets to be punished will be Kim Song Min, representative of the "Radio Free North Korea" who is the prime mover of the recent attempted terrorism, Pak Sang Hak, representative of the "Federation of the Movement for Free North Korea" who is keen on abduction, terrorism and plots, Jo Myong Chol, former director of the "Unification Education Institute", and Kim Yong Hwan, a despicable renegade.
					
					3. We will in the future, too, never allow those abductors, terrorists and saboteurs who dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, encroach upon its sovereignty and threaten the safety of its citizens and their organizers and those involved in them to go scot-free even by scouring all parts of the earth.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean conservative group will be wholly accountable for all this.
					
					 It is an inviolable and legitimate right of the DPRK to devotedly protect the dignity of its supreme leadership and safeguard its sovereignty and the safety of its people.
					
					 Those who dare hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system and people will not be safe no matter where they are and they will not be able to escape merciless punishment of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group should clearly understand that the steel-strong single-minded unity of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK is unbreakable as they are under the great illustrious commander.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits 
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Kim Il Sung University headed by Song Ja Rip, president of the university and minister of Higher Education, left here Tuesday by air to visit China and Vietnam.
					 The friendship delegation of the General Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs led by General Director Mun Song Mo returned home Tuesday after wrapping up its visits to China and Laos.

articles.title: Brazilian Int'l Secretary Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Brazilian Int'l Secretary Visits Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Ricardo Alemao Abreu, international relations secretary of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party, visited Mangyongdae.
					 He went round relics, being briefed on the revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung and his patriotic and revolutionary family members at Mangyongdae.
					
					 He then visited revolutionary sites on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 At the end of his visit he said:
					
					 I deem it an honor to visit Kim Il Sung's birthplace at Mangyongdae. The visit offered me an opportunity to know better about his revolutionary career and the great feats he performed for the era and mankind.
					
					 I was deeply moved to see the Korean people preserving well the old home at Mangyongdae and educating the younger generation in a revolutionary way.
					
					 The guest also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Party Founding Memorial Tower, etc.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China (CPC) led by Head Wang Jiarui visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday.
					 The guests laid a floral basket before the statues before paying homage to them.

articles.title: Chinese Military Attache Hosts Reception to Mark 85th Anniversary of CPLA
articles.content:
Chinese Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception to Mark 85th Anniversary of CPLA
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai hosted a reception at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel Tuesday to mark the 85th anniversary of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (CPLA). 
					 Present there on invitation were General Pak Jae Gyong and other generals and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned, diplomatic envoys and military attaches of various countries here.
					
					 Military Attache Zhang Ping and other staff members of the Chinese embassy here were present there.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: National Memorial Service for Kang Pan Sok Held
articles.content:
National Memorial Service for Kang Pan Sok Held
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- A national memorial service was held at the People's Palace of Culture Tuesday, the 80th anniversary of the death of Kang Pan Sok, an indomitable revolutionary fighter and outstanding leader of the Korean women's movement.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim and Choe Ryong Hae, members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), and other senior officials of the party, state and army, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, labor innovators, working people, the chief of the Anti-imperialist National Democratic Front and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, made a memorial address.
					
					 He said that Kang Pan Sok was an ardent patriot who devoted her all to the movement for the country's independence and thus made a great contribution to bringing the dawn of the country's liberation.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 She took the lead in the anti-Japanese national liberation struggle of Korea, helping Kim Hyong Jik in his revolutionary activities to pave the way for making a switchover to the proletarian revolution from the nationalist movement.
					
					 She implanted a genuine outlook on life and revolution into the mind of her son, President Kim Il Sung. Under her ardent and true love, he grew up to be an outstanding leader of revolution and embarked on the sacred struggle for the country's liberation, shouldering upon himself the future of the country and Koreans.
					
					 She was teacher of people and great mother of revolution as she taught them how to live and struggle for the country, the nation and revolution by setting an example herself.
					
					 Short as her life was, her noble feats are recorded in history as a heroic epic because she was an ardent patriot and indomitable revolutionary fighter who dedicated her family and life to the country's independence and people's freedom and liberation.
					
					 The cause of the country's independence and women's emancipation so much desired by Kang Pan Sok was successfully accomplished by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the DPRK, a socialist country, is dynamically advancing toward fresh victory while demonstrating the invincibility of Songun Korea under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Statue and Grave of Kang Pan Sok
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Statue and Grave of Kang Pan Sok
						
Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the statue of Kang Pan Sok, an indomitable revolutionary fighter and outstanding leader of the Korean women's movement, at the Chilgol Revolutionary Site in Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang and her grave at Mangyongdae on Tuesday on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of her passing away.
					 Seen before the statue and grave were wreaths sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Mun Kyong Dok, Kwak Pom Gi, Ri Pyong Sam, Chairman of the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party Kim Yong Dae, officials of party and armed forces organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons and other people.
					
					 Laid before the statue and grave were wreaths in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Also placed there were wreaths in the name of public organizations, ministries, national institutions, military academies, educational institutions, revolutionary schools, party and power organs, factories, farms, etc. in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kang Pan Sok before the statue and grave.

articles.title: Kang Pan Sok, Indomitable Revolutionary
articles.content:
Kang Pan Sok, Indomitable Revolutionary
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- July 31 marks the 80th anniversary of the death of Kang Pan Sok, mother of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Kang Pan Sok, an indomitable revolutionary, contributed to opening up a new era of modern Korea by actively assisting her son's revolutionary activities.
					
					 Kim Il Sung's ardent patriotism and noble personality were cultivated by her honest love for him.
					
					 It was in the early period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle that Kim Il Sung called on her mother with a sack of cereal upon hearing the news her sickness went from bad to worse.
					
					 At that time she scolded her son, saying she never thought he would carry a sack of cereal to support her.
					
					 Then she earnestly urged his son to dedicate his time only to the revolutionary activities for the Korean nation suffering from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule.
					
					 Recalling the days, Kim Il Sung in his reminiscences "With the Century" wrote:
					
					 "The love she showed me was not simply a motherly love. It was true revolutionary affection with which she regarded me as the son of the nation rather than her own son and awakened me to the need to give priority to loyalty to the country over filial piety towards my parents."

articles.title: War Veteran Delegates Visit Rungna People's Pleasure Ground
articles.content:
War Veteran Delegates Visit Rungna People's Pleasure Ground 
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- The war veteran delegates to celebrations of the 59th anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War visited the Rungna People's Pleasure Ground Tuesday.
					 They went round various places of the ground, being briefed on the fact that the world's best pleasure ground was built on the picturesque Rungna Islet under the profound loving care shown by Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un for the people.
					
					 They looked round the wonderful performance tank, auxiliary tank, the room for the dissemination of science and technology and welfare and service facilities at the Rungna Dolphinarium. They were very much impressed to watch a variety of skills presented by dolphins.
					
					 They also toured the comprehensive Rungna Wading Pool including a mini-golf course, water slide, beach volleyball, basketball and volleyball courts all of which matches well the beautiful landscape of the islet.
					
					 They had a pleasant rest, meeting with their families and relatives in Pyongyang.

articles.title: DPRK Weight-lifter Sets New World Record in London Olympics
articles.content:
DPRK Weight-lifter Sets New World Record in London Olympics
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- DPRK weight-lifter Kim Un Guk set a new world record and took a gold medal in men's 62-kg category in London Olympics Monday.
					 He succeeded in lifting 153 kg in snatch and 174 kg in clean-and-jerk, 327 kg in all, by organically combining quick snatch, fast lifting and other smart skills.
					
					 In snatch he lifted 10 kg more than the last Olympic record and 13 kg more than the runner-up, thus setting a new Olympic record and breaking the world record in total sum.

articles.title: An Kum Ae, First Gold Medalist of DPRK at London Olympiad
articles.content:
An Kum Ae, First Gold Medalist of DPRK at London Olympiad
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- An Kum Ae, a judoist of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, won the women's 52kg category at the London Olympic Games on Sunday, bringing the first gold medal to the nation.
					 She defeated her rivals from Britain, Japan and France in the preliminaries and quarterfinals and beat Italian player by ippon in the semifinals.
					
					 In the finals, she overpowered the Cuban rival by displaying her strong perseverance and high technique.
					
					 The news is delighting the Korean people so much.
					
					 Ri Song Chol, a section chief of the April 25 Sports Team, told KCNA:
					
					 "In the matches An Kum Ae displayed pluck and confidence instilled by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Her success has given great strength and courage to the servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK in making victorious advance.
					
					 In response to Kim Jong Un's call "Forward to the final victory", we will intensify training and produce more competent athletes, thus displaying the dignity and mettle of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's nation."
					
					 An Jong Ryon, father of An Kum Ae, said:
					
					 "Watching on TV my daughter in the match, all my family burst into cheers and tears. She owes her success to the great leaders, the benevolent social system and the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 All neighbors call at my house to offer congratulations to my family."
					
					 An Kum Ae's mother Mun Jong Sik said:
					
					 "Now I am very happy with my daughter who delighted the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 She has played judo for more than 20 years. In those years she has engrossed only in training with no time to care for other things, even makeup. Today she emerged a victor, bringing me a great joy."
					
					 Kim Song Hwa, an athlete of the April 25 Sports Team, said:
					
					 "We were very pleased to see An standing on the honor platform with tears in her eyes.
					
					 We will buckle down to training so as to bring the news of victory to Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un by raising the DPRK flag in international tournaments."

articles.title: DPRK People Seized with Joy over Successes in Olympiad
articles.content:
DPRK People Seized with Joy over Successes in Olympiad
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- DPRK weightlifter Kim Un Guk set a new world record in 62 kg category on July 30 at the London Olympic Games, bringing the country third gold medal in two days.
					 The news has put the whole country into tumult of joy.
					
					 Jong In Ho, a teacher at Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA:
					
					 "I saw with anxiety on TV the DPRK athletes' matches. As the DPRK flag was hoisting higher than others, I got so excited that I could hardly repress my tears rolling down my cheek."
					
					 U Song Hui, a work-team head at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, said:
					
					 "I extend my warm congratulations to the DPRK gold medalists. They won the matches, demonstrating the Korean people's ability, strong will and courage.
					
					 I am proud of the good athletes augmenting the honor of the country.
					
					 Yu Jung Ryol, an employee at the Nampho City Power Distribution Station, said:
					
					 "I was told that DPRK weightlifter Om Yun Chol said his success is ascribable to the spirit instilled by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His remark represents what all of local people want to say.
					
					 I will devote myself to building a thriving nation, true to the leadership of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, as the gold medalists did for the country."

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifter Breaks World Record in Olympiad
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifter Breaks World Record in Olympiad
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Un Guk, a weightlifter of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, set a new world record and won a gold medal in men's 62kg category in London Olympics Monday.
					 He succeeded in lifting 153 kg in snatch and 174 kg in clean-and-jerk, 327 kg in all.
					
					 Kim, belonging to the April 25 Sports Team, is an ace athlete well-known at home and abroad. He cut brilliant figure in the 2011 Asian Weightlifting Championships, 16th Asian Games and 5th East Asian Games and bagged three gold medals in world weightlifting championships in 2010 and 2011.
					
					 He proved successful at local games, including the Sports Contest for Mangyongdae Prize and national championships and was selected as one of the ten best players in the country twice.
					
					 The DPRK has bagged three gold and one bronze medals at the London Olympiad until now, the first gold medal by An Kum Ae, a female judoist, and the second by weightlifter Om Yun Chol, who set a new world record.
					
					 The good results are delighting the local people while arousing public interest in sports.

articles.title: Hoechang County Strives to Run Local Factories at Full Capacity
articles.content:
Hoechang County Strives to Run Local Factories at Full Capacity
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- A nationwide drive for following the example of Changsong County, North Phyongan Province, is gaining momentum in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Changsong County rose to fame for its developed local industry. The county's factories, equipped with up-to-date machines, are in full operation with locally available raw materials.
					
					 Pak Tong Hi, vice-chairman of the Hoechang County People's Committee in South Phyongan Province, told KCNA:
					
					 "Our county is a mountainous area like Changsong County.
					
					 In recent years, our county has directed efforts to putting enterprise management on a scientific basis and made signal achievements."
					
					 The Hoechang Essential Foodstuff Factory finished the computerization of all its production processes and is now ensuring the production on a normal basis. Its products, bean paste, soy, liquor, bean curd and processed vegetables, are supplied to county residents non-stop.
					
					 The Hoechang Foodstuff Factory introduced advanced technology and control system to upgrade the quality of products. It also remolded a cookie-molding roller and applied a system of automatically controlling the temperature in the cookie production process. The bean milk production is increasing at the factory.
					
					 The same holds true for the Hoechang Furniture Factory.
					
					 It is no doubt that ours will soon be a well-off county."

articles.title: Miracles Wrought by DPRK People in Korean War
articles.content:
Miracles Wrought by DPRK People in Korean War 
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea wrought a miracle of history by winning in the Korean War (June 1950-July 1953). 
					 The Korean War was launched by the U.S. imperialists' surprise invasion of the two-year-old DPRK. But the DPRK rapidly went over to counterattack to liberate Seoul, the enemy's stronghold, three days after the outbreak of the war and more than 90 percent of the whole areas of south Korea in a matter of one month.
					
					 With only four torpedo boats seamen of the Korean People's Army sank the U.S. heavy cruiser Baltimore and a light cruiser in the sea off Jumunjin in early July Juche 39 (1950).
					
					 From September 13 to 15 in 1950 a KPA coastal artillery company on Wolmi Island heroically fought with only four guns against the 50 000-strong U.S. forces aboard several hundred warships, supported by more than 1 000 planes, thus delaying their landing on Inchon for three days.
					
					 The KPA soldiers defended the Height 1211 to the last in face of the enemy's "wave attacks" supported by 30 000 to 40 000 bombs and shells a day. They also seized in 15 minutes the Height 351, which was allegedly turned into a strong fortress for two odd years.
					
					 After all, the U.S. suffered a bitter defeat in the Korean War, the first ever in its several hundred-year-long history of wars. 
					
					 Under the guidance of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, an ever-victorious and iron-willed commander, the Korean people overpowered the U.S. imperialists' numerical and technical superiority with their ideological and tactical might to win a great victory in the war, known to be a miracle in the 20th century.

articles.title: People in DPRK Vow to Take Merciless Revenge on S. Korean Traitors
articles.content:
People in DPRK Vow to Take Merciless Revenge on S. Korean Traitors
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- All the people of the DPRK feel  rising anger at the hideous politically-motivated state-sponsored terrorism by the U.S. and the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group of traitors of south Korea aimed to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 Sin Won Il, manager of the Pukchang Area Coal Mining Complex, said:
					
					 I can hardly repress resentment at the heinous crimes by the U.S. and its puppet group of traitors in south Korea.
					
					 Just thinking of it sends my blood boiling. With nothing can the U.S. and the group of rat-like Lee redeem their crimes before the history, nation and mankind.
					
					 A few months ago, they kicked up propaganda hurting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership. They are now making desperate efforts with blood-shot eyes to destroy even statues of peerlessly great persons. How can we pardon such traitors?
					
					 All the miners of the complex will seek out enemies running amuck in their anti-DPRK confrontation, tear them to pieces and throw them overboard.
					
					 All the people in the world were shocked by the vicious moves of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet group of traitors, said Ri Yong Ho, chief of the Pyongyang Steel Joint-Venture Company, in harsh tones, and went on:
					
					 They are utterly ignorant of the Korean people.
					
					 The enemies can never bring down single-minded unity around the party and the leader and socialist system no matter how desperately they may try.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean group of traitors should clearly understand the will of the army and people of the DPRK to take merciless revenge and retaliation against them.
					
					 We will plunge the heinous criminals into boiling furnace as they unhesitatingly attempt even the hideous politically-motivated state-sponsored terrorism, not content with hurting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership.
					
					 Jang Ki Song, a worker of the Songyo Knitting Mill, said:
					
					 The enemies can never cover up the truth behind their criminal moves.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the group of rat-like Lee are, indeed, war maniacs, confrontation fanatics and kingpin of terrorism as they are running reckless, being caught in a mad fit.
					
					 Only death awaits the U.S. imperialists and their lackey Lee Myung Bak regime devoid of elementary reason and moral sense of obligation as human being.

articles.title: DPRK Will Answer U.S. Moves for New War with Sacred War: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Answer U.S. Moves for New War with Sacred War: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK will answer the U.S. imperialists' moves for a new war with a just and sacred war to firmly defend the dignity of the nation and put an end to the history of division. Rodong Sinmun says this in a bylined article Tuesday.
					 The U.S. imperialists are trying to give impression that they are deeply interested in peace and security on the Korean Peninsula but, behind the scene, they are hatching all kinds of base intrigues and plots to unleash a new war, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 Their moves to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and destroy the mental mainstay of the army and people of the DPRK go to prove that they are trying to ignite a war against it in an undisguised manner.
					
					 The heinous subversive and sabotage moves they are preparing by instigating the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and drawing those defectors to the south are the gravest politically-motivated terrorist act and a base declaration of war against the DPRK.
					
					 OPLAN 5029 worked out by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet regime is a scenario for occupying the DPRK through immediate military intervention of the U.S. forces and the south Korean army in case of "contingency" in the DPRK.
					
					  The heinous terrorist act disclosed recently proves that the U.S. is using even defectors to the south, betrayers and renegades for creating "contingency".
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are mulling igniting a war against the DPRK by committing heinous subversive and sabotage moves. This is a new method of aggression and hideous crime which startles and stuns the world.
					
					 If the U.S. hurts the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and try to put into practice even a bit its scheme to destroy the mainstay of the army and people of the DPRK, they will mercilessly wipe out the provocateurs by mobilizing all self-defensive deterrents they have built up. The U.S. imperialists would be well advised to stop acting rashly.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Projected U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Projected U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Exercises
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea announced that they would kick off Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises across south Korea on August 20. It was reported that the exercises, which will last till August 31, would involve huge forces including at least 30 000 U.S. forces, more than 56 000 south Korean troops and lots of war hardware.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee regime assert that the above-said saber-rattling is for "ensuring security" and "maintaining combined defense posture" but it is nothing but sheer sophism to conceal the aggressive nature of the maneuvers.
					
					 The objective of Ulji Freedom Guardian staged by them every year was to carry out their scenario for a war against the DPRK and examine and round off the duties and procedures of operations to be conducted in the subsequent period.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that they are mulling hurling even riff-raffs into the exercises under the signboard of the UN. The U.S. hurled its mercenaries under the berets of "UN forces" into battlefields during the last Korean War fought against the DPRK. It is the ulterior design of the U.S. to use mercenaries of its allies as a shock brigade in the second Korean War, too. The south Korean puppet regime is desperately working to hurt compatriots, pursuant to the U.S. strategy for invading the DPRK.
					
					 Nothing is more foolish than their attempts to occupy the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 It is an unshakable will of the army and people of the DPRK to wipe out the ferocious aggressors and blow up the bases for provocations once an order is issued.
					
					 The U.S. and rat-like Lee group will never escape retaliatory blows of the army and people of the DPRK as they are busy staging madcap saber-rattling against them, not satiated with their attempted monstrous terrorism.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Remarks by Some Opposition Party Officials of S. Korea Dismissed
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Remarks by Some Opposition Party Officials of S. Korea Dismissed 
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, "presidential candidates" from some opposition parties and their spokesmen spoke ill of the dignity and social system in the DPRK.
					 They were reported to have uttered that "it is necessary for the north to opt for reforms" and "the issues of politics and human rights are serious there".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a politically-motivated provocation to the DPRK as it represents an act of rightist capitulation for cooperating with the Lee Myung Bak group in the moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It is quite clear that those heavyweights of opposition parties talked such nonsense in a bid to gratify their political greed by joining the conservative ruling forces in their vicious moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen and the racket for "eliminating the forces following the north." 
					
					 Whatever their motive might be, their reckless remarks can never be tolerated as they are nothing but a malignant smear campaign against the DPRK and acts of infusing wrong understanding of it into the compatriots in the south.
					
					 A politician must judge the trend of the times and the mind-set of the people and ponder over the consequences to be entailed by his utterances.
					
					 The south Korean public is calling for progressive politics and a policy for inter-Korean reconciliation.
					
					 People would not be open-hearted towards the opportunists who have neither political principle nor have any ability to judge their mind-set and the trend of the times.
					
					 Whoever truly wishes to work for the sake of the country and the nation should behave as required by the fellow countrymen and the times and fulfill his or her commitment. This would be a proper way for a politician to fulfill his or her mission on behalf of history and the nation.
					
					 Those who join the conservative group in its confrontation hysteria will not be able to escape a miserable fate, after being repudiated and condemned by the people for being its partners.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group, Kingpin of Scandals and Bandit of Thieves
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group, Kingpin of Scandals and Bandit of Thieves 
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Scandals of traitor Lee Myung Bak and his families and relatives and confidants have been disclosed one after another, sparking off big furor in south Korea.
					 As already exposed, Lee Myung Bak amassed and concealed staggering 800 billion won by running the whole gamut of scandals including the BBK stock price fabrication case, the Naegokdong housing lot purchase case.
					
					 Lee Sang Duk, elder brother of the "president", has been hell-bent on frauds and swindles, exercising the strongest power of the present regime as he is called "man of supreme power", "senior minister" and "the brother who clears every paper." Not only Lee Sang Duk but other members of traitor Lee Myung Bak's family are thieves.
					
					 When a restaurant which his wife had operated in the U.S. with investment of billions of won went bankrupt, Lee kept it afloat by paying money out of budget of the present "government." 
					
					  Cousins of Lee's wife were involved in the case of Pusan Savings Bank, stunning south Koreans. They received billions of won from the managing director of the Seoul Bus Transport Trade Unions with the promise to help him become a member of the "National Assembly". The traitor's senior brother-in-law illegally expropriated hundreds of millions of won in just three years.
					
					 Like master, like man. His grandchildren by his daughter have also been greatly influenced by Lee and his clan's money-making. So, they are reported to have amassed hundreds of millions of won. Lee's family members and relatives have committed too many scams to cite. They included his son-in-law's stock price fabrication case and the slush fund case of parents of his daughter-in-law.
					
					 It was disclosed shortly ago that Kim Hui Jung, chief of the first room attached to Chongwadae who is the closest confidant of Lee Myung Bak, received hundreds of millions of won from savings banks.
					
					 Among those who were put in custody or stood trials so far on charges of involvement in scandals were Lee Sang Duk, Pak Hui Thae, former speaker of the "National Assembly", Choe Si Jung, former chairman of the Broadcasting and Communication Committee, Ri Yong Ho, former chief secretary of Chongwadae, Pak Yong Jun, former vice-minister of Knowledge-based Economy, and others and at least 40 persons on the side of Lee Myung Bak and his wife's side. 
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" is a hotbed and kingpin of scams as it has zealously patronized and fostered such misdeeds of the present regime which was installed on the roots of Lee.
					
					 There is no way out for Lee as he has so craftily fleeced the south Koreans and the group of the "Saenuri Party" can never escape the same lot as his.

articles.title: S. Korean "Saenuri Party's" Intention to Revive Dictatorship Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean "Saenuri Party's" Intention to Revive Dictatorship Assailed 
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- "Presidential" candidates from the south Korean "Saenuri Party" are openly calling for reviving fascist dictatorship.
					 Park Geun-hye in a speech on July 16 justified May 16 military coup as an "unavoidable and best option", making rubbish that the coup laid a cornerstone for today's Republic of Korea.
					
					 In the face of harsh public criticism of these remarks, Park said there are lots of like-minded people, it is necessary to avoid time-consuming argument and this should be left to historical judgment, touching off bigger furor.
					
					 Other candidates have gone intent on miming Park Chung-hee.
					
					 Former governor of Kyonggi Province Kim Mun Su insisted on reviving anti-communist education in primary schools while underscoring the need to educate in historic legitimacy on July 17.
					
					 More serious is that there is no sign of attempt inside the "Saenuri Party" to criticize or correct these anachronistic remarks by candidates on different tickets. 
					
					 Instead, voices mount calling for despising and ignoring the verification of historical facts among core personnel recently posted by Park.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" clan has gone desperate in its efforts to revive fascist dictatorship while speaking loudly of the achievements made by the "Yusin" regime.
					
					 There took place an opening ceremony for "Park Chung-hee Memorial" in downtown Seoul on February 21.
					
					 The traitorous regime of south Korea seeks to use it as a means for education of students.
					
					 TV dramas eulogizing the dictator are openly on show and seminars opened to laud him.
					
					 The members of the "seven person society" who serve Park Geun-hye like a tool are those who held core posts of power during the "third Republic" of Park Chung-hee and the "fifth Republic" of Chun Doo-hwan.
					
					 Reviving in south Korea is horror politics of "Yusin" dictator which make people shudder at the mere thought of it.
					
					 Candidates on the ticket of the "Saenuri Party" are desperately trying to seize power again, saying "forces following the north should not be allowed to take over the power".
					
					 Clear is that when "Saenuri Party" comes to power, fascist dictatorship will revive in south Korea, inflicting bigger pain and disaster on the people in south Korea, a dark society where there is hardly fresh air to breathe.
					
					 Professor of Tongyang University Jin Jung Gwon in articles recently posted on Internet website said "a drive for horror politics has began by Park Geun-hye and forces following Park Chung-hee and Chun Doo-hwan" and that "from the atmosphere under the pretext of security it is clear that atmosphere putting into the shade that in the period of the third and fifth Republics will prevail when Park Geun-hye comes to power".
					
					 No matter how loudly the "Saenuri Party" claim "change" and "reform", it can never cover up its true colors as a fascist dictatorial party that has inherited the tradition of "Yusin".

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Condemn U.S. and S. Korean Regime's Terrorism against DPRK
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Condemn U.S. and S. Korean Regime's Terrorism against DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. released a statement on July 24 denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime for attempting hideous terrorism against the DPRK. 
					 The statement said that the Koreans in the U.S. were shocked by the news of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' attempted heinous terrorism against the DPRK. 
					
					 It noted that they could hardly repress their resentment at Lee Myung Bak's nefarious policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					
					 It lashed out at Lee for derailing the process to improve the inter-Korean relations through national reconciliation and cooperation in total denial of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and staging ceaseless drills for a war of aggression, driving the situation to the brink of a war. 
					
					 The statement said: Not content with such crimes, the Lee regime worked out a sinister scenario to do harm to the compatriots in the north with a huge financial investment. It infiltrated a terrorist group into the north to blow up statues and monuments in a bid to float rumor that what would happen in the north was a sort of rebellion.
					
					 The recent attempted terrorism was a due outcome of the war moves of the Lee regime and the U.S. which has still kept the Korean Peninsula in a state of war although nearly 60 years have passed since the Armistice Agreement (AA) was signed.
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee regime should halt all the joint military drills targeting the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK at once, halt its war moves and replace AA by a peace-keeping mechanism.
					
					 The Lee regime should respect the two declarations and opt for national reconciliation and independent and peaceful reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Swiss Organization
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its Internet website leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" on July 24.
					 The work made public on July 26, 1996 clarifies an idea that the Juche philosophy is a unique one that was developed and systematized on its own principles and a revolutionary and popular one that serves the purpose of the people's struggle for independence.
					
					 The work also indicates tasks for studying and explaining the Juche philosophy as intended by the party and thoroughly embodying it in the revolutionary practice.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Congratulated on Receiving Title of Marshal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Congratulated on Receiving Title of Marshal 
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Suk Library in Peru published a special bulletin on July 23 congratulating Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un on receiving the title of DPRK Marshal.
					 The bulletin carried portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and a photo of Kim Jong Un standing on the tribune of honor for a military parade marking the 100th Day of the Sun.
					
					 The bulletin warmly congratulated Kim Jong Un on receiving the title of DPRK Marshal according to a decision made by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 It expressed belief that the Korean people would continue to vigorously advance towards a victory in the drive to build a thriving socialist nation true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Congratulated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Congratulated in Different Countries 
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Personages of Democratic Congo, Guinea and Ethiopia congratulated Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un on receiving the title of DPRK Marshal. 
					 Jimmy Kikoni, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Democratic Congo, in his statement on July 22 said that Kim Jong Un's reception of the title of DPRK Marshal marked a special event as it gives a rosy prospect to the Korean people and oppressed people of the world. 
					
					 The torch of the Songun revolution held higher by Kim Jong Un will shine as a banner for eternal victory, he added. 
					
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, in his statement on July 23 said the awarding of the title of DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un is a demonstration of the will of the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish generation after generation the Juche revolutionary cause started by President Kim Il Sung and successfully led by leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the army and people of the DPRK led by Marshal Kim Jong Un would achieve a decisive victory in the struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. 
					
					 Nigatu Dagnachew, chairman of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea, in his statement on July 21 said that the conferment of the title of DPRK Marshal upon Kim Jong Un was an expression of the Korean people's ardent loyalty to him.
					
					 He expressed envy at the Korean people who enjoy blessings from the great leaders as they hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as supreme leader of the party, state and army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in UK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in UK 
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on July 21 as regards the publication of the work authored by First Secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Un "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People". 
					 The statement said that the work is of great ideological and theoretical significance. 
					
					 In the work Kim Jong Un clarifies that Kim Il Sung was the most prominent leader and peerlessly great man in the 20th century and the 20th century was the century of Kim Il Sung in name and reality, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un dealt with the brilliant and victorious history of Korea and precious experience gained in the process of the Korean revolution. 
					
					 He also clarified that leader Kim Jong Il resolutely defended the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and wisely led the struggle to materialize them. 
					
					 He stressed that the Party, army and people of the DPRK would faithfully carry forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il to accomplish the Juche revolutionary cause under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. 
					
					 The work indicative of the ideo-theoretical insight of Kim Jong Un enriches Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. 
					
					 We call upon all the Juche idea followers and progressives in the world to intensify the study and dissemination of the work.

articles.title: DPRK's War Victory Day Marked in Benin, Nigeria
articles.content:
DPRK's War Victory Day Marked in Benin, Nigeria 
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- A seminar took place in Benin and a photo exhibition and film show in Nigeria in the period from July 16 to 22 on the occasion of the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 On display at the venue of the photo exhibition were photos showing the feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il and the efforts of the army and people of the DPRK for building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 The Korean film "Arms of Korea" was shown at the film show. 
					
					 The chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism said that President Kim Il Sung wisely led the Korean people to win the historic victory in the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. invasion. 
					
					 The Korean people always won victory in the politico-military stand-off with the U.S. that lasted for over half a century after the war thanks to Kim Il Sung, an invincible and iron-willed commander, he said.
					
					 A department director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria and the chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics praised Generalissimo Kim Il Sung as outstanding strategist and most prominent great man in the 20th century who defeated the U.S. and its following forces' numerical and technical superiority by means of politico-ideological, strategic and tactical superiority.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported in Austria
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported in Austria 
						
 Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- The Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation made public a statement of solidarity on July 21 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle. 
					 The statement extended solidarity to the workers and other Korean people on the occasion of the month. 
					
					 As already disclosed, the south Korean regime in collusion with the U.S. imperialists openly commit terrorism against the DPRK, it said, and went on:
					
					 Even now the U.S. imperialists and their allied forces persistently impose illegal sanctions on the DPRK. 
					
					 They often stage military exercises against the DPRK in the areas along the Military Demarcation Line, extremely threatening the regional peace. 
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's measures and the struggle of its entire people to frustrate constant provocations and aggression moves by the U.S. imperialists and their allied forces.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia la funcion de Banda Moranbong por 27 de Julio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia la funcion de Banda Moranbong por 27 de Julio
						
Pyongyang, 31 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal  Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion de la Banda Moranbong dedicada al dia de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (27 de julio).
					El salio al palco junto con su esposa Ri Sol Ju.
					
					La funcion iniciada con la interpretacion del Himno Nacional tuvo dos partes; la primera que demuestra el proceso historico de la guerra coreana y la segunda sobre los sentimientos jubilosos por la victoria en guerra.
					
					En medio de fuegos artificiales, se presentaron en la escena la musica ligera y cancion "27 de julio, dia de la victoria", la musica ligera "Lucero General", "A la batalla decisiva" y "Avance", el solo femenino y pangchang "Cancion del combatiente", el duo femenino "Mi vida entera", el trio femenino "Mi vida y la patria", el sexteto femenino "Ecos de la victoria en la guerra", la musica ligera y cancion "?Vivimos como en aquel tiempo?", la musica ligera "La patria recordara eternamente", la musica ligera y cancion "Vencedores", el sexteto femenino "Hablan los duenos de esta tierra", la musica ligera "Mirennos", el sexteto femenino "Cantamos el partido" y otras piezas.
					
					Las actrices de la banda demostraron que la victoria en la pasada guerra fue el fruto de la autoctona idea militar, la extraordinaria estrategia y tactica y el excepcional arte de mando militar del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del poderio de la unidad monolitica del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea en torno al partido y al lider y su indoblegable espiritu.
					
					En el sexto femenino "Cancion del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino" y la cancion principal de la telenovela china "Mao Anying",  describieron de modo artistico el hecho historico de que el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea y China lucharon juntos derramando sangre contra los imperialistas, enemigos comunes.
					
					Interpretaron perfectamente las musicas famosas del mundo, incluyendo la musica ligera "Chardash".
					
					Cada vez que 11 instrumentalistas y 6 cantantes de la banda escenificaban con su gran habilidad un fresco mundo musical, los espectadores les aclamaban hospitalariamente.
					
					Cuando repercutia el sexteto femenino "Nuestro dirigente adorado por el pueblo" y se proyectaba en la pantalla la imagen afectuosa del Mariscal Kim Jong Un atendiendo multiples cuestiones de todo el pais que forma una gran familia, los espectadores se pusieron de pie emocionados y llenaron el auditorio de estruendosas ovaciones.
					
					Kim Jong Un respondio con su mano a las aclamaciones de las ejecutantes y espectadores y felicito los exitos de la funcion.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Pak To Chun, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok y los delegados de veteranos de guerra a  los festejos del dia de la victoria de guerra, los artistas y los estudiantes capitalinos.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto central en memoria de Kang Pan Sok
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto central en memoria de Kang Pan Sok
						
Pyongyang, 31 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este martes en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central en memoria de Kang Pan Sok por el 80o aniversario del fallecimiento de esta indoblegable combatiente revolucionaria y destacada dirigente del movimiento femenino de Corea.
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las ramas de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica y prensa e informacion, los benemeritos y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Ademas, participaron el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista y los coreanos en ultramar.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio recordando la vida y las hazanas de      Kang Pan Sok.
					
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Thae Bok, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC.
					
					Kang Pan Sok fue ferviente patriota quien dedico todo lo suyo al movimiento independentista del pais e hizo gran aporte a traer la aurora de liberacion de la patria, senalo Kim y continuo:
					
					Ella asesoro en todo lo posible las actividades revolucionarias de Kim Hyong Jik que al frente de la lucha de liberacion nacional antijaponesa, dio inicio a la transicion del movimiento nacionalista a la revolucion del proletariado.
					
					Bajo el calido amor materno de Kang que le enseno la verdadera concepcion de vida y revolucion, el Presidente Kim Il Sung crecio como destacado dirigente de la revolucion, que se encargaria del futuro de la patria y la nacion, y emprendio el camino de la sagrada lucha por la liberacion de la patria.
					
					Ella fue la maestra del pueblo y gran madre de la revolucion que enseno con sus acciones ejemplares a todos los hijos y mujeres coreanos como se debian vivir y luchar para el pais, la nacion y la revolucion.
					
					Su corta vida ha sido coronada con nobles hazanas realizadas por la independencia de la patria, la libertad y la liberacion del pueblo.
					
					La independencia de la patria y la causa de emancipacion de la mujer, deseadas tanto por     Kang Pan Sok, se lograron gracias a los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu y bajo la orientacion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, nuestra patria socialista avanza sin parar hoy en dia hacia la nueva victoria demostrando firmemente el caracter invencible de la Corea del Songun.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia nueva provocacion politica de EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia nueva provocacion politica de EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 31 de julio (ACNC) -- El vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 31 una declaracion como sigue:
					En estos dias, las autoridades de alto rango de EE.UU. perpetraron de manera concentrada la provocacion politica contra la RPDC.
					
					El maximo gobernante califico de una "amenaza al mundo" el autodefensivo disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC y el secretario de Defensa lo acuso otra vez  de "provocacion".
					
					La secretaria y otros funcionarios del Departamento de Estado calumniaron a ciegas a la RPDC con las desinformaciones contrarias a la realidad de esta sin tener el juicio propio capaz de distinguir la verdad del engano.
					
					Traman ardid para justificar su politica hostil anti-RPDC acusandola todavia de lanzamiento del satelite artificial con fines pacificos.
					
					Las malignas palabras de las autoridades norteamericanas que tienen la arraigada negacion y hostilidad a la idea y el regimen optados por el pueblo coreano, reafirmaron que sigue invariable la politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC.
					
					Todo el mundo conoce que el imperio tiene enemistad a la RPDC.
					
					Entonces, ?Por que las autoridades de la administracion norteamericana se enfrascan como ahora en la campana intrigante anti-RPDC sin precedente?
					
					Sus actos reflejan el miedo de EE.UU. ante el hecho de que se elevan la simpatia y la expectativa de las personas del mundo en el radiante porvenir de Corea que tiene al gran hombre sin par admirado por todo el mundo.
					
					Tambien persiguen calmar la fuerte censura y presion de la sociedad internacional, segun la cual es imposible garantizar la paz y la estabilidad duraderas de la Peninsula Coreana antes de eliminar primero la anacronica politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					EE.UU. dice que no tiene enemistad a la RPDC mientras difama con malignidad a esta, lo que no pasa de ser una hipocresia para enganar la opinion publica.
					
					Lo prueba la accion de EE.UU. en total contraste a su palabra de no tener la voluntad de hostilizarla. 
					
					Ahora, EE.UU. introduce en el territorio surcoreano y su contorno una gran cantidad de sofisticados medios belicos y libra sin parar los entrenamientos militares conjuntos de gran dimension contra la RPDC.
					
					Ese pais, que suele hablar del problema de la "vida del pueblo" de alguien, amenaza nuestro derecho a la vida e impide el desarrollo economico y el mejoramiento de los niveles de vida de nuestro pueblo con su mas brutal y persistente campana de sancion y bloqueo anti-RPDC.
					
					Sin embargo, habla como si la RPDC pudiera llevar una vida rica si renuncia a su arma nuclear, lo cual hace recordar el sermon del lobo de no atacar a la oveja docil.
					
					Responder a la politica hostil de EE.UU. con el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear es nuestra invariable opcion.
					
					Gracias al formidable disuasivo nuclear y la industria belica capaz de fortalecerlo continuamente, podemos dar acicates a la construccion de potencia economica sin vacilar ni un comino aunque EE.UU. prosiga su politica hostil.
					
					No nos hacen falta las instrucciones ajenas porque tenemos la estrategia y el rumbo a nuestro estilo para desarrollar la economia y mejorar la vida del pueblo y los remedios para implementarla.
					
					Con el fusil en una mano y la bandera de la revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo en la otra, levantaremos sin falta un Estado prospero socialista haciendo frente hasta el final a la politica hostil norteamericana con una posicion super-intransigente.

articles.title: Kim Un Guk rompe el record mundial en los XXX juegos olimpicos
articles.content:
Kim Un Guk rompe el record mundial en los XXX juegos olimpicos 
						
Pyongyang, 31 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Un Guk conquisto el dia 30 una medalla de oro en la division de 62kg del levantamiento de pesas (M) en los 30o Juegos Olimpicos registrando nuevo record mundial.
					Kim levanto 153kg en arranque y 174kg en envion con un total de 327kg.
					
					En el estilo arranque, el muchacho levanto 10kg mas que el record establecido en la anterior edicion olimpica y 13kg mas que el ocupante del segundo lugar.

articles.title: An Kum Ae - primera medallista de oro en Londres
articles.content:
An Kum Ae - primera medallista de oro en Londres
						
Pyongyang, 31 de julio (ACNC) -- La adorable hija de Corea, An Kum Ae, gano la primera medalla de oro para la RPDC en la division de 52 kg del judo femenino de los 30o Juegos Olimpicos de Londres.
					Ella vencio en las eliminatorias y los cuartos de final a sus rivales de Gran Bretana, Japon y Francia y doblego por ippong a la contrincante italiana en la semifinal.
					
					En la final del dia 29, logro ganar en el tiempo extra a la tambien finalista cubana luchando con gran maestria y resistencia.
					
					Esta noticia se propago en un instante a todo el pais inspirando en los militares y civiles la conviccion de la victoria de los deportistas.
					
					Entrevistado con la ACNC, el jefe de departamento del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril, Ri Song Chol, (53 anos de edad) dijo como sigue:
					
					An Kum Ae ocupo el primer lugar porque lucho con la audacia y la fe que le infundio el Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un. Su victoria estimula mucho a nuestros militares y habitantes.
					
					Intensificaremos el entrenamiento como los guerrilleros antijaponeses del monte Paektu y formaremos a mucho mas jugadores competentes que puedan poner de pleno manifiesto el temperamento de la nacion de Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il logrando victorias consecutivas en los juegos internacionales.
					
					Padre de la campeona olimpica, An Jong Ryon (67 anos de edad) expreso a la ACNC:
					
					Se me humedecieron las mejillas cuando vi por TV la imagen de mi hija con la medalla de oro y el izamiento de la bandera nacional.
					
					Bajo la atencion de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu y en el regazo de nuestra patria grata, mi hija pudo subir a lo mas alto del podio.
					
					Los vecinos me estan felicitando por el exito de mi hija. Les digo que el que merece los saludos de felicitacion y agradecimiento es nuestro Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Madre de An, Mun Jong Sik (65 anos de edad) dijo:
					
					Estoy muy contenta por haber dedicar mi hija la alegre al Maximo Dirigente.
					
					Mi hija pude lograr el resultado de hoy como consecuencia de que durante 20 anos y pico cultivo diariamente sin descanso para dar al Mariscal     Kim Jong Un.
					
					Kim Song Hwa, yudoca de Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril expreso como sigue:
					
					Estamos muy alegres al ver a An Kum Ae en podio informando al Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un la noticia de victoria.
					
					 Determinamos que al dar acicate al ejercicio, informaremos solo la noticia de victoria al Comandante Supremo izando la bandera nacional en los juegos.
